content.html: I think youâ€™ve perfectly nailed my exact reaction to stumbling upon this community myself in the waning days of 2022. content.html: Do you own a house? Is there a mortgage on the house? Are there any loans, lines or credit, leans, or other financial instruments secured on that house? Then you donâ€™t really own that house. The bank (or mortgage company) does. Do you own a car? Do you make payments on a loan for that car? Then you donâ€™t really own the car. The bank (or lending company) does. If you donâ€™t believe me, then stop making payments and see just how quickly that thing you â€œownâ€ is taken away. In fact, banks, mortgagâ€¦

content.html: The weekly report from Digital Wellbeing on my phone informs me that the daily average screen time was 20 minutes less than last weekâ€™s. And I am pleased to see that trend has been downwards for the last few weeks. I uninstalled YouTube from my phone a few weeks back, which is one of the key reasons for lowered usage. YouTube sucks away time without you noticing. The best way I know to control this beast is to not be available to you. The web app is a pain enough to not be distracting. So jusâ€¦

And I am pleased to see that trend has been downwards for the last few weeks. I uninstalled YouTube from my phone a few weeks back, which is one of the key reasons for lowered usage. YouTube sucks away time without you noticing. The best way I know to control this beast is to not be available to you. The web app is a pain enough to not be distracting. So jusâ€¦

content.html:
YouTube has kind of become my learning resource lately so my time has gone up a fair bit recently.

  • One of my goals for 2023 is to learn a new programming language (Go) and become more proficient in one I know a little about (Python). In addition to reading materials, YouTube coding sessions have really helped to visualize not just the language but tools and aesthetics surrounding them.
  • Iâ€™m an armchair urbanist and watching videos made by creators like @notjustbikes@notjustbikes.com and @nerd4cities@mstdn.social gives me life. In fact I donâ€™t watch a lot of â€œmainstreamâ€ TV because Iâ€™m a documentary and factoid nerd and content like this is 80% of my playlists.
  • YouTube is also the biggest repository of Lofi music on the internet and itâ€™s the background sound of my existence at the moment, so youâ€™re bound to hear it piped into whatever space Iâ€™m occupying while reading, sipping coffee, working and sometimes sleeping. YouTube is how it streams in most casesâ€¦

TLDR; I would be SOL if YouTube and Google started spazzing out like Twitter is right nowâ€¦ ğŸ™„

In addition to reading materials, YouTube coding sessions have really helped to visualize not just the language but tools and aesthetics surrounding them.Iâ€™m an armchair urbanist and watching videos made by creators like @notjustbikes@notjustbikes.com and @nerd4cities@mstdn.social gives me life. In fact I donâ€™t watch a lot of â€œmainstreamâ€ TV because Iâ€™m a documentary and factoid nerd and content like this is 80% of my playlists.YouTube is also the biggest repository of Lofi music on the internet and itâ€™s the background sound of my existence at the moment, so youâ€™re bound to hear it piped into whatever space Iâ€™m occupying while reading, sipping coffee, working and sometimes sleeping. YouTube is how it streams in most casesâ€¦TLDR; I would be SOL if YouTube and Google started spazzing out like Twitter is right nowâ€¦ ğŸ™„
